statements: SELECT * FROM GMO_Licensing;
SELECT licensee_name, licensed_region FROM GMO_Licensing;
SELECT * FROM GMO_Licensing WHERE expiry_date IS NULL;
SELECT license_id, patent_id, licensing_date FROM GMO_Licensing ORDER BY licensing_date DESC;
SELECT licensee_name, contact_person_name, contact_email FROM GMO_Licensing WHERE licensed_region='Europe';
SELECT * FROM GMO_Licensing WHERE licensing_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT license_id, licensee_name, licensed_region FROM GMO_Licensing WHERE expiry_date IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT licensing_date FROM GMO_Licensing WHERE licensed_region = 'Europe' ORDER BY licensing_date DESC;
SELECT license_id, licensee_name, licensing_date FROM GMO_Licensing WHERE contact_person_name IS NOT NULL AND contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM GMO_Licensing WHERE licensee_name LIKE '%Inc%' AND licensed_region IN ('North America', 'South America') ORDER BY licensing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM licenses;
SELECT id, license_number, license_description FROM licenses;
SELECT license_description, license_number FROM licenses ORDER BY license_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE patent_owner = 'John Smith';
SELECT patent_description, patent_number FROM patents ORDER BY patent_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM licenses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT license_number, license_description FROM licenses WHERE license_number > 100;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE patent_owner = 'Company X' ORDER BY patent_number DESC;
SELECT patent_description FROM patents WHERE patent_number BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT id, patent_description, patent_owner FROM patents ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM licensing;
SELECT patent_number, license_holder, issue_date FROM licensing WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT patent_number, inventor FROM patents WHERE filing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, technology_name, description FROM technology WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE inventor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM licensing WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_title, inventor FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT license_holder, issue_date FROM licensing WHERE issue_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT technology_name, description FROM technology WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE patent_number = 'US123456';
SELECT * FROM licensing;
SELECT licensee, patent_number, issue_date FROM licensing WHERE id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT licensee, patent_number FROM licensing WHERE issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT technology, expiration_date FROM patent ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM licensee WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM licensing ORDER BY issue_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patent_number, licensee FROM licensing WHERE issue_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT licensee.name, licensee.address, gmo_crop.crop_name FROM licensee JOIN gmo_crop ON licensee.licensee_id = gmo_crop.licensee_id WHERE gmo_crop.crop_name = 'GMO Corn';
SELECT * FROM patent WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT licensing.id, patent.patent_number, licensee.name AS licensee_name FROM licensing JOIN patent ON licensing.patent_number = patent.patent_number JOIN licensee ON licensing.licensee = licensee.name WHERE licensing.id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM Licensing;
SELECT license_id, patent_id, licensee_name FROM Licensing WHERE issue_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT company_id, company_name, industry FROM Companies ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University X';
SELECT license_id, company_id, expiration_date FROM LicensingHistory WHERE expiration_date > '2025-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Licensing;
SELECT patent_id, licensee_name, issue_date FROM Licensing WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM Researchers ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT patent_name, filed_date FROM Patents WHERE inventors LIKE '%John%';
